name: Julian C. Dunn
body:
### Ohai

I’m currently a senior consultant at [Chef](https://www.getchef.com/), where I help clients with their training and implementation needs for our flagship systems automation product, also named Chef.

I have over ten years of experience in the technology sector, working for companies large and small including [SecondMarket](https://www.secondmarket.com/), the [Canadian Broadcasting Corporation](http://www.cbc.ca/), FSC Internet (Telus), and VerticalScope.

I’m also a news junkie and extremely concerned about the decline of mass media and journalism in our society. I’m a passionate advocate for the use of technology to assist in telling good stories. I originally came to New York to pursue a Master’s degree in journalism.

I hold a Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering from the University of Toronto.

I am married to [Meredith Noble](http://www.meredi.com/), who is an information architect and user experience designer with [Catalyst Group](http://www.catalystnyc.com/). We live in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn, with our cat, Elliot.

My other interests are in urban affairs and planning, transportation systems, telephony, public radio, documentaries, live theater, modern art, indie pop/folk/rock, and cycling.
